  • Method Details

    • getUserCount

      public int getUserCount() throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves the total count of users with the 'User' role directly from the database.
      Returns:
      The total number of users.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the JDBC driver is not found.

    • getBookingCount

      public int getBookingCount() throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves the total count of bookings directly from the database.
      Returns:
      The total number of bookings.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the JDBC driver is not found.

    • getActiveExhibitionCount

      public int getActiveExhibitionCount() throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves the count of currently active exhibitions directly from the database. An exhibition is considered active if its end date is on or after the current date.
      Returns:
      The number of active exhibitions.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the JDBC driver is not found.

    • getArtifactCount

      public int getArtifactCount() throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves the total count of artifacts directly from the database.
      Returns:
      The total number of artifacts.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the JDBC driver is not found.

    • getArtifactDistribution

      public Map<String,Integer> getArtifactDistribution() throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves the distribution of artifacts by category directly from the database. Returns a Map where the key is the category and the value is the count.
      Returns:
      A map of artifact categories and their counts.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the JDBC driver is not found.
